keyMoments.title: Billy's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Billy appears drinking at the W Brothers bar with a 5,000,000 berry bounty on his head.
keyMoments.significance: Introduced as the first target of Zoro's bounty hunting shown in flashback.

keyMoments.title: Billy Defeated by Zoro
keyMoments.description: Billy attacks Zoro but is swiftly defeated with a single sword strike.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the gap in skill between Billy and Zoro.

relationships.description: Billy is Dick's sworn younger brother.

evolutionMoments.description: Revealed that Billy and Dick are sworn brothers.

keyMoments.title: Dick's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Dick, leader of the Dick Bandits with a 10,000,000 berry bounty, arrives at the village seeking revenge for Billy's capture.
keyMoments.significance: Introduced as the episode's main antagonist.

keyMoments.title: Dick Defeated by Zoro
keyMoments.description: Dick is defeated by Zoro's Oni Giri technique after his bazooka is disabled by Harry.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Zoro's overwhelming power and cements his reputation.

bounties.reason: Banditry and leading the Dick Bandits

abilities.description: Dick uses a flintlock-style bazooka capable of creating large explosions.
Dick completely overwhelmed Johnny and Yosaku with nothing more than slaps and kicks while remaining stationary.

relationships.description: Dick is Billy's sworn older brother and seeks revenge for his capture.

evolutionMoments.description: Dick reveals Billy is his sworn younger brother and attacks the village for revenge.

keyMoments.title: Harry Stands Up to Dick
keyMoments.description: Harry, a young village boy, bravely attempts to defend the village storage from Dick's bandits despite being terrified.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates courage and inspires Johnny and Yosaku to fight.

keyMoments.title: Harry Disables Dick's Bazooka
keyMoments.description: Harry pours water on Dick's bazooka, disabling it at a crucial moment and enabling Zoro's victory.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even the smallest person can make a decisive difference through quick thinking.

reveals.information: Brave and willing to defend his village despite fear

keyMoments.title: Zoro Defeats Billy
keyMoments.description: Zoro swiftly defeats Billy with a single sword strike to claim his bounty.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Zoro's efficiency as a bounty hunter before joining the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Meets Johnny and Yosaku
keyMoments.description: Zoro gives Billy's bounty to Johnny and Yosaku, establishing their friendship.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Zoro's bond with Johnny and Yosaku.
keyMoments.quote: You can have him. Just pay my bar tab.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Reveals His Quest for Mihawk
keyMoments.description: Zoro explains he's searching for Dracule Mihawk to become the world's greatest swordsman.
keyMoments.significance: Reinforces Zoro's core motivation before joining the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.quote: I'm searching for a man named Dracule Mihawk. My goal is to become the world's greatest swordsman.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Uses Oni Giri
keyMoments.description: Zoro uses his Three Sword Style Oni Giri technique to defeat Dick and his entire crew.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Zoro's mastery and earns Johnny and Yosaku's eternal admiration.

reveals.information: Was traveling as a bounty hunter searching for Mihawk before joining Luffy

keyMoments.title: Johnny Meets Zoro
keyMoments.description: Johnny meets Zoro for the first time when Zoro gives him Billy's bounty.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the beginning of Johnny's friendship and admiration for Zoro.

keyMoments.title: Johnny's Childhood Dream
keyMoments.description: Johnny recalls his childhood dream of becoming a bounty hunter to protect his village.
keyMoments.significance: Provides character depth and motivation for Johnny.

keyMoments.title: Johnny Fights Dick
keyMoments.description: Johnny fights Dick alongside Yosaku but is quickly overwhelmed.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Johnny's courage despite being outmatched.

reveals.information: Had a childhood dream of becoming a bounty hunter to protect his village from pirates

keyMoments.title: Yosaku Spots Billy
keyMoments.description: Yosaku notices Billy at the bar and identifies his 5,000,000 berry bounty.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the initial conflict of the episode.
keyMoments.quote: That's Billy! He's got 5,000,000 on his head!

keyMoments.title: Yosaku Meets Zoro
keyMoments.description: Yosaku meets Zoro for the first time when Zoro gives him Billy's bounty.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the beginning of Yosaku's friendship and admiration for Zoro.

keyMoments.title: Yosaku Fights Dick
keyMoments.description: Yosaku fights Dick alongside Johnny but is quickly overwhelmed.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Yosaku's courage despite being outmatched.
